data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: I would like to talk about an important decision that I made in my life. It was changing my major from bachelor of sciences to bachelor of arts. It was a big decision that I made three years ago. Initially, my parents were not being very supportive of my decision. However, after several debates with them, eventually, they compromised and decided to support me to pursue my dream. After completing the three years course, I was so proud of myself. Although as a student who had no art background, it took me a lot of effort and time to get used to the process, when I finally obtained my degree and landed a job as a user experience designer, I was so grateful for the decision that I made 3 years ago!
data.referenceText: Talk about an important decision or choice that you made in your life. How long ago was it? What was the result and was it a good choice?
data.referenceTranslate: 谈谈你在生活中做的一个重要的决定或选择，它是多久以前的结果是什么，是一个好的选择。
